entries: You know a great deal about the natural world, and you command and train animals and magical beasts.
Even if you're untrained in Nature, you can use it to {@action Recall Knowledge}.

items: {@b {@action Recall Knowledge}} about fauna, flora, geography, weather, the environment, creatures of natural origin (like animals, beasts, fey, and plants), the First World, the Material Plane, and the Elemental Planes.

entries.name: Nature Trained Actions
entries: You must be trained in Nature to use the following general skill actions.

items: {@b {@action Learn a Spell}} from the {@trait primal} tradition.
